key.name: default-key
key.description: This specifies the ID of the default PGP key to use for certain operations, mainly signing.

key.name: ascii-armor
key.description: When encrypting or signing PGP files whether to use ASCII armor encoding.

key.name: sort-recipients-by
key.summary: The column to sort the recipients
key.description: Specify the column to sort the recipients window by. Columns are: 'name' and 'id'. Put a '-' in front of the column name to sort in descending order.

key.name: encrypt-to-self
key.summary: Whether to always encrypt to default key
key.description: If set to true, then the default key will always be added to an encryption recipients list.

key.name: last-signer
key.summary: Last key used to sign a message.
key.description: The ID of the last secret key used to sign a message.
